title: Tech’s In Vogue This Year…Literally
content:
I know this might be shocking to you, but I’m not a fashion expert. I’m lucky if I can find two matching socks to wear. Most of the time I give up and don’t. However, it looks like the rest of the tech world is looking to up its fashion game, namely Apple and Amazon. Read More See more here:
Tech’s In Vogue This Year…Literally
